function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Digital non-taxation regimes in different countries benefit large corporations, depriving local smes in the ict sector of fair competition and market access.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Post-covid-19 stimulus packages and strategies favor the embrace of new digital technologies, potentially creating a competitive advantage for larger politico-financed competitors over local smes in the ict sector.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cessation of the world trade organisation wto moratorium on custom duties for electronic transmissions","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing rate of transactions coupling data and financial","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emergence of new market-based instruments riding on the blockchain network","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled data collection and storage leading to privacy and security risks.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High volume of data increasing the risk of data overload and mismanagement.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Segregation of information in the urban realm within independent private corporations and government bodies.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Configuration of sensor devices by contracted corporations to be incompatible with those of their competitors.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cross-usage of data in monitoring internal country travel, leading to inadequate tracking of community dispersals and contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardization of protocols and networks for urban technology","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disaster management policy","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of disease propagation in disaster-affected areas","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Architects and urban planners not being involved in pandemic planning and response","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of emergency response as an engineering challenge rather than a design challenge","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient time to plan and design pandemic response infrastructure","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disaster management protocols for architectural and urban institutions for biological disasters like disease epidemics","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness and response to pandemics despite the availability of modern technologies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited consideration of bio-risk management in architectural and urban planning","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardization of protocols for seamless communication in the healthcare sector","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of pandemic preparedness in urban planning and architecture","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited capacity to build emergency facilities and support basic survival needs in least developed/developing economies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of 5g application scenarios","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g for contact tracing may lead to privacy and security risks for individuals’ data.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent large-scale outbreaks of infectious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid variation of some viruses","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"5g technology as a disruptive innovation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High bandwidth and low latency of 5g enable efficient delivery of iot data, increasing the risk of rapid spread of contagious diseases through iot devices.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ai technology can predict the spread of diseases and assist in finding cures, leading to the potential misuse of ai for bioterrorism or deliberate disease spread.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Telemedicine and digitalized prevention measures may create a false sense of security, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing and other preventive measures.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of universal commercialization of 5g technology","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient research on business and social value of 5g","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of rumors and panic related to 5g technology","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of conspiracy theories related to 5g and covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of 5g’s business and social value in pandemic prevention and control research","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on digital materiality’s impact on innovation in dynamic environments","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"5g-enabled pandemic control and prevention may lead to increased reliance on technology and decreased human interaction, potentially impacting mental and emotional well-being.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The rapid deployment of 5g technology for pandemic control may lead to privacy and security concerns related to data collection and monitoring.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on 5g technology for pandemic control may exacerbate the digital divide, leaving certain populations with limited access to essential services and information.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge and protection leading to rapid spread of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New phenomenon and lack of extant literature","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of virus through close contact","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lockdown of city and closure of public transport","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scattered outbreaks due to imported cases and goods","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on unverified data sources for research","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation through microblog and wechat","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public perception of 5g technology and pandemic prevention","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear data analysis process and methodology","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate validation and triangulation of sources","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of confirmation bias in data analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
